entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this morning and early this afternoon then 60 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
